NegativeEntailmentTest.purpose: Test that annotation properties are discarded when considering OWL-Direct entailment
NegativeEntailmentTest.description: When using the OWL-Direct profile for importing ontologies, annotation properties must be discarded, and do not affect the rules or the conclusions that may be drawn from the ruleset.

PremiseDocument.Presentation:
Document( Prefix(ex <http://example.org/example#>) Prefix(dc <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>)
Import(<http://example.org/mygraph> <http://www.w3.org/ns/entailment/OWL-Direct>)
Group ( Forall ?x ?y ( ?x[ex:hasTitle -> ?y] :- ?x[dc:title -> ?y]) ) )
